name: AVAudio3DMixing
desc: A collection of properties that define 3D mixing properties.

items.name: var obstruction: Float
items.desc: A value that simulates filtering of the direct path of sound due to an obstacle.

items.name: var occlusion: Float
items.desc: A value that simulates filtering of the direct and reverb paths of sound due to an obstacle.

items.name: var position: AVAudio3DPoint
items.desc: The location of the source in the 3D environment.

items.name: var rate: Float
items.desc: A value that changes the playback rate of the input signal.

items.name: var pointSourceInHeadMode: AVAudio3DMixingPointSourceInHeadMode
items.desc: The in-head mode for a point source.

items.name: var reverbBlend: Float
items.desc: A value that controls the blend of dry and reverb processed audio.

items.name: var sourceMode: AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode
items.desc: The source mode for the input bus of the audio environment node.

items.name: var renderingAlgorithm: AVAudio3DMixingRenderingAlgorithm
items.desc: The type of rendering algorithm the mixer uses.

items.name: enum AVAudio3DMixingRenderingAlgorithm
items.desc: The types of rendering algorithms available per input bus of the environment node.
